name: Redeemart: A Convenient Apocalypse
description:
When Jonah walked into the Redeemart convenience store after having his heart broken, he didn't expect to be weathering an apocalypse there. But now he'll have to rely on the other characters in the store and duct-taped together weapons to survive. Step into his shoes and fight through waves of monsters with top-down twin-stick shooter gameplay. Grow stronger with new abilities and upgrades by collecting trading cards. And build new friendships with the people in the store.

Evolving Challenges

With multiple weapons to be made and used throughout the story, a variety of engaging enemies, and varied and memorable mini-games, Redeemart will constantly keep you on the edge of your seat.

Unique Story Mechanics

Be a part of Jonah's journey to redemption by literally controlling his rebuilding. And be helped along the way by the friends you make.

Distinctive Visuals

Redeemart features a brand-new engine built from the ground up to power its impressive graphics and excellent performance.

Powerful Story

Telling a heartfelt tale that will have you invested in its characters.
